articles.title: Twitter faces fresh controversy after verifying fake Disney children's account - Rolling Stone UK
articles.description: Twitter's verification process under the ownership of Elon Musk faces fresh backlash after accidentally verifying an explicit account that claimed to be linked to Disney.
articles.content:
Twitter’s verification process under the ownership of Elon Musk faces fresh backlash after accidentally verifying an explicit account that claimed to be linked to Disney.
